Comment: Abilities: AHds (Demonic Shield), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: An impenetrable shield surrounds the Hero, protecting him from all damage and spells for a set amount of time. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Lasts 1 seconds. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Lasts 2 seconds.  |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Lasts 3 seconds.|n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - Lasts 4 seconds.
